idea-plugin.name: Flutter Pub Version Checker
idea-plugin.description:
Plugin for checking the latest Pub packages versions.
It will automatically run inspection in your pubspec.yaml file to check all dependencies and compare versions with the latest versions from Pub package repository.
idea-plugin.change-notes:
1.0.1

  • Fixing bug caused by commented dependencies

    • 1.0.0

    • Support for checking packages version in format x.x.x
